item.title: 摩根大通私人银行任命卡塔尼亚为欧洲大陆地区主管
item.description: 摩根大通表示，已任命萨拉-卡塔尼亚（Sarah Catania）为欧洲大陆私人银行业务负责人，向摩根大通欧洲、中东和非洲私人银行首席执行官巴勃罗-加尼卡（Pablo Garnica）汇报。【原文：JPMorgan said it had named Sarah Catania head of its private banking business for continental Europe, reporting to Pablo Garnica, chief executive of JPMorgan Private Bank for Europe, Middle East and Africa.】

item.title: 美国重新考虑批准马萨诸塞州的另一座海上风电场
item.description: 根据周三提交的一份法庭文件，特朗普政府正在重新考虑批准伊贝尔德罗拉公司（Iberdrola）计划在马萨诸塞州海岸实施的新英格兰风电项目。【原文：The Trump administration is reconsidering the approval of Iberdrola's planned New England Wind project off the coast of Massachusetts, according to a court filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 星巴克推出人工智能库存清点系统
item.description: 全球咖啡连锁店星巴克周三宣布，将在 9 月底之前在北美的 11000 多家门店推出采用人工智能技术的新库存清点系统。【原文：Starbucks is rolling out a new system for counting inventory that uses artificial intelligence technology to its more than 11,000 company-owned stores in North America by the end of September, the global coffee chain announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: 加拿大总理称周一与特朗普通话，交谈愉快
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周三表示，他周一与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进行了长时间的富有成效的对话，内容涉及贸易问题和其他话题。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney on Wednesday said he had a lengthy and productive conversation with U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday, covering trade issues and other topics.】

item.title: 雪佛龙与安哥拉签署初步协议，在近海区块勘探石油
item.description: 美国石油巨头雪佛龙公司周三称，该公司已与安哥拉国家石油和天然气特许公司ANPG签署初步协议，在该国33/24号近海区块勘探石油。【原文：Chevron has signed a preliminary agreement with Angola's national oil and gas concessionaire ANPG to explore for oil in the country's offshore block 33/24, the U.S. oil major said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储宣布十月召开支付创新会议
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）周三宣布，将于 10 月 21 日举办一场关于支付创新的会议。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve announced Wednesday it would host an Oct. 21 conference on payments innovation.】

item.title: 独家报道康菲石油称将裁员 20-25
item.description: 美国石油和天然气生产商康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）发言人周三表示，该公司将裁员20%-25%。【原文：U.S. oil and gas producer ConocoPhillips will cut 20-25% of its workforce, a company spokesperson said Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会称，Pornhub 就其在儿童性虐待材料方面欺骗用户的指控达成和解
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）和犹他州周三表示，Pornhub.com 和其他色情网站的经营者已同意就该委员会和犹他州的指控达成和解，这些网站欺骗用户，没有采取任何措施阻止含有儿童性虐待内容和非自愿内容的视频和照片。【原文：The operators of Pornhub.com and other pornographic websites have agreed to settle charges by the Federal Trade Commission and the state of Utah that they deceived users by doing little to block videos and photos featuring child sexual abuse material and nonconsensual material, the agency said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 纳斯达克维拉芬公司与 BioCatch 建立合作关系，遏制支付欺诈行为
item.description: 纳斯达克维拉芬公司（Nasdaq Verafin）和欺诈检测公司 BioCatch 周三表示，双方已结成战略合作伙伴关系，将结合各自的技术打击日益猖獗的支付欺诈行为。【原文：Nasdaq Verafin and fraud detection firm BioCatch said on Wednesday they had formed a strategic partnership to combine their technologies to combat rising payments fraud.】

item.title: 商用飞机预订疲软拖累美国 7 月工厂订单
item.description: 受商用飞机预订疲软的影响，7 月份美国制成品的新订单有所下降，但企业似乎在第三季度初保持了强劲的设备支出步伐。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods fell in July, pulled down by weakness in commercial aircraft bookings, but businesses appeared to have maintained a strong pace of spending on equipment early in the third quarter.】

item.title: 美国征收 15%的关税，欧盟称其贸易仍在流动
item.description: 欧盟委员会的一位高级贸易官员周三表示，美国对从欧盟进口的商品征收15%的关税仍然允许与美国的贸易流通，重要的不是税率本身，而是与竞争对手相比的水平。【原文：U.S. tariffs of 15% on imports from the European Union still allow trade with the United States to flow and what is important is not the rate itself but the level compared with competitors, a senior European Commission trade official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国企业债市场在市场假期后强势回归
item.description: 周二，美国企业借款人纷纷涌入投资级债券市场，抓住借贷成本接近历史最低水平的机会，抢在美联储本月晚些时候召开利率会议引发市场波动之前出手。【原文：U.S. corporate borrowers flocked to the investment-grade bond market on Tuesday, seizing on near-record tight borrowing costs and getting ahead of any market volatility sparked by the Federal Reserve's interest rate meeting later this month.】

item.title: 罢工一个月后，波音防务公司坚持其最后的合同提议
item.description: 波音防务公司周三表示，将考虑对其向圣路易斯地区大约3200名罢工工会成员提出的最后一份合同进行 "小幅调整"，该公司在圣路易斯地区生产战斗机和弹药。【原文：Boeing Defense said Wednesday it would consider "minor adjustments" to its last contract offer to roughly 3,200 union members on strike in the St. Louis area, where it produces fighter jets and munitions.】

item.title: 美国 7 月份职位空缺减少；招聘乏力
item.description: 美国 7 月份的职位空缺降幅超过预期，招聘情况温和，与劳动力市场的宽松状况一致。【原文：U.S. job openings fell more than expected in July and hiring was moderate, consistent with easing labor market conditions.】

item.title: 专注于非洲的电信公司 Paratus 推出纳米比亚首个私营移动网络
item.description: 专注于非洲的电信运营商和网络服务提供商 Paratus Group 在纳米比亚推出了首个由私营公司运营的移动网络，此举有望颠覆由国有 MTC 和纳米比亚电信公司主导的当地市场。【原文：Africa-focused telecommunications operator and network services provider Paratus Group has launched the first mobile network run by a private company in Namibia, a move expected to disrupt the local market dominated by state-owned MTC and Telecom Namibia.】

item.title: 大众利用 Polo 品牌名称开发经济型掀背式电动车
item.description: 大众汽车周三表示，将为其计划中的紧凑型掀背式电动车使用Polo品牌名称，该车型之前被称为ID.2，是该汽车制造商努力抵御中国竞争的一款关键车型。【原文：Volkswagen on Wednesday said it would use the Polo brand name for its planned compact hatchback electric vehicle, previously dubbed ID.2, a key model in the carmaker's efforts to stave off Chinese competition.】

item.title: 雀巢首席财务官：徇私投诉引发对首席执行官的调查
item.description: 雀巢公司一位高级管理人员在 Freixe 被解雇两天后的本周三表示，雀巢公司在 5 月份收到了有关前首席执行官 Laurent Freixe 不公平地偏袒他人的投诉，以及有关他与一名员工有恋爱关系的报道。【原文：Nestle received complaints in May of improper favoritism by ex-CEO Laurent Freixe along with reports he was in a romantic relationship with an employee, a senior company executive said on Wednesday, two days after Freixe was sacked.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克：通胀仍是主要担忧，但今年可能只需降息四分之一个百分点
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周三表示，高通胀仍是美国联邦储备委员会面临的主要风险，尽管劳动力市场疲软的证据仍可能证明今年有必要降息一个季度。【原文：High inflation remains the U.S. Federal Reserve's main risk, though evidence of a weaker labor market still likely warrants a single quarter-point rate cut this year, Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利 "非常担心 "美国联邦储备委员会独立性受到威胁
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）周三表示，他 "非常担心 "美国联邦储备委员会的独立性受到威胁，并称这是一个 "非常严重 "的问题。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said on Wednesday he was "very concerned" about threats to the U.S. Federal Reserve's independence, describing it as a "very serious" issue.】

item.title: 铜矿商泰克在运营审查中推迟主要项目审批
item.description: 泰克资源公司（Teck Resources）周二晚些时候表示，作为全公司运营审查的一部分，该公司将推迟批准重大发展项目，直到其位于智利的Quebrada Blanca二期（QB2）铜矿实现稳定运营和目标产量。【原文：Teck Resources late on Tuesday said it would defer approving major growth projects until its Quebrada Blanca Phase 2 (QB2) copper mine in Chile achieves steady operations and target output, as part of a companywide operations review.】

item.title: 加拿大西捷航空公司在机队更新计划中订购 67 架波音飞机
item.description: 加拿大低成本航空公司西捷航空（WestJet）周三表示，作为机队更新计划的一部分，该公司订购了67架波音飞机，其中包括7架787-9梦想飞机和60架737-10 MAX窄体飞机。【原文：Low-cost Canadian carrier WestJet said on Wednesday it ordered 67 Boeing aircraft as part of a fleet renewal, including seven 787-9 Dreamliners, and 60 737-10 MAX narrowbodies as part of a fleet renewal plan.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔再次呼吁 9 月降息，步伐取决于数据
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周三再次呼吁，鉴于劳动力市场的疲软，美联储应在9月份降息，并表示央行之后的降息速度将取决于经济的下一步发展。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller on Wednesday repeated his call for an interest-rate cut in September given the weakening in the labor market, and said that how fast the central bank cuts after that will depend on what happens next in the economy.】

item.title: PayPal 和 Venmo 用户将提前使用 Perplexity 的 Comet AI 浏览器
item.description: 数字支付公司Perplexity周三表示，美国和部分全球市场的贝宝（PayPal）和Venmo用户将通过为期12个月的Pro订阅试用，提前获得Perplexity新推出的人工智能Comet浏览器。【原文：PayPal and Venmo users in the U.S. and some global markets will receive early access to Perplexity's new AI-powered Comet browser through a 12-month trial of the startup's Pro subscription, the digital payments company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: SoFi 推出以人工智能为主题的新 ETF，质疑声与日俱增
item.description: 本周三，SoFi Technologies 公司近两年来首次推出交易所交易基金，押注零售投资领域最热门的人工智能。【原文：SoFi Technologies jumped back into the exchange-traded fund business on Wednesday with its first launch in nearly two years, betting on artificial intelligence, the hottest theme in retail investing.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆称政策到位，警告就业市场风险
item.description: 圣路易斯联储主席阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆周三表示，鉴于当前的经济数据，美国央行的货币政策正处于正确的位置。【原文：St. Louis Federal Reserve President Alberto Musalem said on Wednesday the U.S. central bank's monetary policy is in the right place given current economic data, in remarks that did not give a clear signal whether he supports an interest rate cut later this month.】

item.title: 金融犯罪监察机构呼吁各国对空壳公司作出澄清
item.description: 全球金融犯罪监察机构负责人呼吁各国公开空壳公司的使用情况，称其为犯罪分子的 "逃亡之车"，并表示这一问题将成为新一轮国家评估的关键部分。【原文：The head of the global financial crime watchdog has called on countries to come clean on the use of shell companies, calling them the "getaway car" for criminals, and said the problem would be a key part of a new round of national assessments.】

item.title: 以色列 Cato Networks 收购 Aim Security，再融资 5000 万美元
item.description: 以色列网络安全公司 Cato Networks 周三表示，它将收购网络初创公司 Aim Security，这是该公司有史以来的首次收购，并将在一轮私人融资中再筹集 5000 万美元。【原文：Israeli cyber security firm Cato Networks said on Wednesday it was buying cyber startup Aim Security, its first ever acquisition, and raising another $50 million in a private funding round.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示，美国工人的财务压力越来越大
item.description: 美国银行的一项调查显示，美国工人对不断增加的个人债务和财务健康状况的压力越来越大。【原文：U.S. workers are becoming more stressed about their rising personal debts and financial health, a Bank of America survey showed.】

item.title: ID.me 在最新融资中估值突破 20 亿美元，推动打击人工智能驱动的欺诈行为
item.description: ID.me 周三表示，它在最新一轮融资中筹集了 3.4 亿美元，加上投资公司 Ribbit Capital 主导的信贷融资，数字身份钱包的估值超过 20 亿美元。【原文：ID.me said on Wednesday it had raised $340 million across its latest funding round, combined with a credit facility, led by investment firm Ribbit Capital, valuing the digital identity wallet at over $2 billion.】

item.title: US Bancorp 恢复机构比特币托管服务
item.description: 美国银行（U.S. Bancorp）在暂停比特币托管服务三年多之后，将重新启动比特币托管服务，因为特朗普政府支持加密货币的姿态鼓励传统金融机构深入研究数字资产。【原文：U.S. Bancorp is restarting its bitcoin custody service after a more than three-year pause, as the Trump administration's pro-crypto posture has encouraged traditional financial institutions to delve deeper into digital assets.】
